title: 3.2 Master Challenge 3
question:
Alphabet speaker

Design a stage with alphabet sprites from A to Z. Write a script for each alphabet that triggers its pronunciation upon clicking it.
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - javascript - R - pseudocode - java
